Key: O-Oh, Kotori...!
H-Hey, Shido. W-Welcome home...!

(I didn't expect her to be there when I opened the
front door. Seeing her after what we just went
through is making me blush...)
U-Um, Shido...

W-Wait, Kotori! Please, forget about earlier! That
was just a dream!

I-I know that. And besides, I'm
embarrassed, too...

Oh, are you...? You seemed to be so into being the
older sister...

...If that's what you want, you can continue to be
Shiori for a while.

*Grunt*... No, sorry, that was my bad. I'll forget
it if you will.

Hmph. As long as we're clear.
...So anyways, where's Arusu?
Huh? She's not back yet?
No, I thought you were with her.

...Come to think of it, I was looking for Maria at
school and then... Sorry, Kotori. I'm going to go
back to school. She may still be there.
W-Wait. I'll go with you.

(And so we headed toward school. If she's not
coming home, we figured she forgot to do something
there.)
So what do you think?
About what?

"Don't "about what" me. Gosh... The thing about
teaching Arusu love. Have you made any progress?"

...That's the thing. I don't know if I'm able to
give her what she wants...
Yah!
Ouch! What the hell?!

Don't give me such a long face. Have more
confidence. If you're acting like that as the
teacher, there's no way she's going to learn.

If you don't know, be loud and proud about it. The
only things going for you are your drive and how
confident you can be with no talent, Shido.
Hey, that's rude.

I mean, you've come this far, right? I've been
watching you for a long time. I'm sure of it. So
you just follow through with what you believe in.
...You're right. Thanks, Kotori.

As long as you know, let's hurry up and find Arusu
so we can go home already.
Hey, Arusu!
Shido? So you've found me.

What's the matter, Maria? Did you find something
interesting at school?
...Yes. There was something like that.
What was it?

More importantly... I'm happy that you've come to
look for me.
M-Maria?! What's the matter...?!
Just as I thought. The reaction I expected.
Th-The reaction you expected? What do you mean?

I thought that if I did this, you'd come looking
for me. If you do this in a game, your heart
skips a beat, right?
Maria...

(I knew it. I think Maria is slowly starting to
change.)

Hey, what are you doing, Shido?! Why are you stuck
to Arusu like that? Get a room already!

W-Well, Maria was...
You just told me you were cheering for me!

Sh-Shut up! That's that. This is this!
Arusu, if you're done with what you're here for,
let's go home! You got it?
Yes, understood.
Okay, Maria. Let's go home.
Okay.
Here.
Hm?
...You don't need me to explain, right?
Oh... Okay.

(I held Kotori's hand with my right, and Maria's
hand with my left. As the three of us headed home,
I felt happy feeling like Maria was family.)

(...And so we continued to hold hands as we went
home.)
